featured.text: Therefore, instead of showing fear and running away, the elephants express their anger and become aggressive. 45.
Helen _____ with anger when she saw her boyfriend kissing an attractive girl.

definition.zh_def: 憤怒，一種強烈的不滿或敵意的情感。
definition.en_def: A strong feeling of annoyance, displeasure, or hostility.
definition.example: His anger was evident when he heard the unfair decision.
